description: Nova works fine with WebOb < 1.2, so this bug is targeting forward-looking WebOb compatibility rather than any current deficiencies.
title: Use of deprecated webob.Request.str_* properties limits compatibility to WebOb < 1.2

comments.content: Nova works fine with WebOb < 1.2, so this bug is targeting forward-looking WebOb compatibility rather than any current deficiencies.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~maru

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master

commit 52c9883ca9dac4fc4369646ac4c323168f9d3ba9
Author: Maru Newby <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Mar 9 17:07:30 2012 -0800

    Replaced use of webob.Request.str_GET
    
     * Changed webob.Request.str_GET => webob.Request.GET to
       ensure compatibility with WebOb >= 1.2.
     * Fixes bug 950478
    
    Change-Id: I21d0d477340d31caa4c92fa76270a392b5eb2cca
